codingProfiles: I like solving problems related to DSA. Here are some of my profiles.

projects.text: Projects are a great way to apply all our learnings. Here are the ones that I have created.

list.name: ./WinterFind
list.description: Winter-Find is a 3D interactive web-based game where the user have to search for a gift in winter world.
list.techStack: React.js, Express.js, Blender, Node,js, Three.js, React Fiber

list.name: Electron
list.description: Electron is a ML model that predicts the required consumption of energy so that additional usage of energy can be saved.
list.techStack: Jupitor Notebook, Pandas, Python, Flask, Sklearn

list.name: parkAway
list.description: It is a parking service where clients can post parking lots for rent. And users or customers can send a request to make a deal or contract. It is a kind of Airbnb for parking lots.
list.techStack: React.js, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Bootstrap, Twilio

list.name: CRUD App
list.description: A simple CRUD (create, read, update, delete) application using MERN stack.

list.name: SpyPooch
list.description: It keeps track of the users gate and lets them know if they cross it by sending them an SMS and only records when the dog or cat is in the frame.
list.techStack: TensorFlow JS, React JS, Node JS, Express JS, Twilio
